‚Äùeya ese ma yi; wenas nokala haki medawarunge da parsiwarunge da wyawasthawa anuwa eya sthira ya‚Äùyi rajathuma pilithuru dunne ya. 13 ewita owhu rajjuruwan idiriyehi pilithuru demin, ‚Äùrajathuma juda ratin allaganu labu ayagen ek keneku wana daniyel, oba ha obathuma athsan kala aagnyawa nosalaka, dawasakata thun warak thamage dewiyanta ayadum karayi‚Äù yayi ki ha. 14 rajathuma me wachana asu wita, imahath sanwegayata path wi, daniyel galawagannata itagena, ira basina thuru ee gana molaya wehesa kalpana kele ya. 15 ekala ee pirisa raju wetha pamina, ‚Äùrajathumani, medawarunge da parsiwarunge da nithiya anuwa raju wisin panawana lada niyogayak wenas kala nohaki bawa obathumata mathak karanu kamaththemu‚Äùyi ki ha. 16 ewita rajathuma daniyel genawuth sinha guhawe damimata niyamayak kele ya.

niwase dora hara thibu awasthawaka ghathakayan niwasata athul wannata athayi polisiya saka karayi.niwase kamarawala almariwala ha badu muttu da muluthan geya thula thibu shithakaranaya ha bhanda da ada dama thibu bawa wartha we.niwase depala kolla kannata pamini pirisak mema ghathanaya sidu karannata athayi saka karana namuth miyagiya ayage malaya ragena nogiye mandayi polisiyata aththe kuthuhalayaki.daruwan nawa denekug mathawak wana eeda magrat mahathmiyage daruwan siw deneku wideshagathawa sitina athara anek daruwan siw dena shri lankawe padinchiwa sitithi.eeda magrat mahathmiyage samiya wana klaransi parsi pranandu (86) ha diyaniyaka samanga ghathanaya sidu wu rajagiriye pihiti niiwase padinchiwa siti namuth siddhiyata pera dinaye samiya ha diyaniya awashyathawakata waththala mabole diyaniiyage niwasata gos thibima nisa magrat mahathmiyata eda niwase thaniwa sitinnata siduwa atha.niiwase thani wu mawata durakathanayen amathum laba ganiddi aya pilithuru nodima nisa diyaniya kalabala wi 29 da ude 8.00 ta pamana nawatha niwasata pamini awasthawedi me ghathanaya sidu wi athi wi daka pasuwa polisiyata danum di thibe.mahesthrath parikshanaya kotuwa mahesthrath thilina gamage mahatha ghathanaya sidu wu ema niwasata pamina pawathwiya.awata niweswala sawikara athi si. si. ti. wi. kamara osse labagath thorathuru anuwa idiri wimarshana sidu karana bawa polis madhya prakashaka polis adhikari buddhika siriwardhana mahatha pawasiya.sarasawiya puwathpatha mudranayata yana witath me sambandhawa kisiwaku athadanguwata gena nothibunu athara me siddhiya sambandhayen kolambaa aparadha kottasaye sahaya athiwa walikada polisiya siddhiya pilibanda parikshana pawathwayi.-
eheth, wiwidha thrastha kriyawalata sambandha yayi saka pita athadanguwata ganu labu sakakaruwo wishala pirisak thawamath bandhanagarawala sitithi.

dawith rachana kala githayaki. 61 ane dewiyani, mage kannalawwata sawan denna.+mage yachnyawata ahumkan denna.+ 2 mage hadawatha wedanawen piri thibena wita mama dura aathaka sitiyath obata handagasannemi.+dewiyani, us parwathayakata mawa gena yanna.+ 3 manda oba mage rakawaranayaya.+sathuru prahara hamuwe shakthimath balakotuwaya.+ 4 sadahatama mama obe kudarame aaganthukayeku lesa sitinnemi.+obe piyapath sewane sangawi mama rakawaranaya labannemi.+ silah. 5 dewiyani, ma dun poronduwalata oba ahumkan dunnehiya.+obe namayata garubiya dakwana ayata oba dena urumaya oba matada dunnehiya.+ 6 oba rajuge aayu kalaya wadi karannehiya.+parampara gananawak pahawa giyath ohu jiwath wanneya.+ 7 ohu sadahatama dewi idiriye wasaya karanneya.+premaya* ha wishwasawanthakama oba ohuta penwa ohuwa aaraksha karannehiya.+ 8 ma dun porondu kisi dinaka kada nowana pinisa+mama sadahatama obe namayata prashansa gi gayannemi.+ githawaliya 61
